mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO instruct (ID, NUMBER, SENDTIME, SENDERID, USER, COMMAND, NAME, PARAMETER, `STATUS`) VALUES (#{id}, #{number}, sysdate(), #{userId}, #{user}, #{command}, #{name}, #{parameter}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM instruct WHERE SENDERID = #{0} AND SENDTIME >= #{1} AND SENDTIME < #{2} AND NUMBER !=''

SELECT ID, NUMBER, SENDTIME, SENDERID, COMMAND, NAME, PARAMETER, `STATUS`, REPLYTIME, RESULT FROM instruct WHERE NUMBER !='' AND SENDERID = #{0} AND SENDTIME >= #{1} AND SENDTIME < #{2} ORDER BY SENDTIME DESC limit #{3},#{4}
SELECT ID, NUMBER, SENDTIME, SENDERID, COMMAND, NAME, PARAMETER, `STATUS`, REPLYTIME, RESULT FROM instruct WHERE ID = #{0} LIMIT 1
